original_text: The people say, ‘We have taken in all our crops from the fields. The summer has finished. And still nobody has rescued us.’ The people say,
korean_text: 추수할 때가 지나고 여름이 다하였으나 우리는 구원을 얻지 못한다 하는도다

sentences.original_text: We have taken in all our crops from the fields
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 밭에서 우리 모든 곡물을 거두어 들였다

sentences.original_text: And still nobody has rescued us
